content.question: Which of the following developments in the early 1800s was meant, in part, to increase the role of the peopleâ€™s consent in government?

choices.label: The growth in the power of the Supreme Court
The promotion of separate spheres ideology
The advocacy for the removal of Native Americans to reservations
The reduction in property qualifications for White male suffrage

content.answer: The reduction in property qualifications for White male suffrage

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
